join.joinCondition: flct.person_id = patient_name.person_id AND (patient_name.voided is null OR patient_name.voided = 0)
flct.person_id = pp.person_id AND (pp.voided is null OR pp.voided = 0)
flct.person_id = patient_id.patient_id and (patient_id.voided is null OR patient_id.voided = 0)
flct.person_id = program.patient_id and (program.voided is null OR program.voided = 0)
fa.person_id = flct.person_id AND fa.next_clinical_encounter_datetime IS NULL
flct.person_id = p.person_id and (p.voided is null OR p.voided = 0 and (p.person_attribute_type_id = 11))

expressionOptions.expression: if((overall_cancer_staging IN (4)) and age >= 30 and age <= 40, 1, null)
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and flct.gender = 'm', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and flct.gender = 'f', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age <= 20, 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age <= 20 and flct.gender = 'm', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age <= 20 and flct.gender = 'f', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 21 and age <= 30, 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 21 and age <= 30 and flct.gender = 'm', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 21 and age <= 30 and flct.gender = 'f', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 31 and age <= 40, 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 31 and age <= 40 and flct.gender = 'm', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 31 and age <= 40 and flct.gender = 'f', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 41 and age <= 50, 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 41 and age <= 50 and flct.gender = 'm', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 41 and age <= 50 and flct.gender = 'f', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 51 and age <= 60, 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 51 and age <= 60 and flct.gender = 'm', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 51 and age <= 60 and flct.gender = 'f', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 61 and age <= 70, 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 61 and age <= 70 and flct.gender = 'm', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 61 and age <= 70 and flct.gender = 'f', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age > 70, 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 71 and flct.gender = 'm', 1, 0))
(IF ((program.date_completed IS NULL AND pp.dead = 0) and age >= 71 and flct.gender = 'f', 1, 0))
